name: Onix
flavorText:
As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.

previous.name: Gengar
previous.flavorText:
Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.

next.name: Drowzee
next.flavorText:
Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.

pokemon.name: Onix
pokemon.flavorText:
As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.

pokemon.name: Steelix
pokemon.flavorText:
It is thought its body transformed
as a result of iron accumulating
internally from swallowing soil.
